name: The Ultimate Theory of Gravity
description:
Manipulate gravity while jumping through space to reach the Black Hole. You play as a famous scientist Stephen Hawking :) It is our form of appreciation of professor's exceptional contribution to modern physics.

Game created during Castle Game Jam 2016 in Örebro (Sweden) by:

  • Adam "Chopin" Andrzejczak - production, gameplay, design
  • Michał "Spolsh" Kłoś - sfx, vfx
  • Jakub "Kijek" Siwek - gameplay, design
  • Jakub "Architect" Ławicki - UI, design
